text: La Villeneuve is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Saône-et-Loire department in east France. On 1 January 2015, the former communes of Clux and La Villeneuve joined together to become the new commune called Clux-Villeneuve. Arrêté du 23 septembre 2014 portant création de la commune nouvelle de Clux-Villeneuve == References == Category:Former communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: La Villeneuve, Saône-et-Loire
